info.author: Fionn Behrens
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU General Public License (GPL)
Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.description:
This module allows for easy communication beween separate parts of a program
or separate programs. It provides a unified, simple API for posix pipes,
fifo pipes and networked (tcp) pipes. You get a file-like pipe object and anything
you write() into it will arrive on the other side, nicely separated. Anything
written into the pipe object on the other side will be read()able on yours.
Built-in message buffering and queueing.
info.keywords: communication, IPC, networking, pipe, socket, fifo
info.name: pIPC
info.html_description: This module allows for easy communication beween separate parts of a program or separate programs. It provides a unified, simple API for posix pipes, fifo pipes and networked (tcp) pipes. You get a file-like pipe object and anything you write() into it will arrive on the other side, nicely separated. Anything written into the pipe object on the other side will be read()able on yours. Built-in message buffering and queueing.
